lines.text:
[Referring to Kenny]
You mean you let him take care of your money?
Why not? I like to live dangerously.
Does that go for girls too?
Honey, I'm going to leave the driving to you.

[Referring to Kenny]
If I were a girl, I would let the measles in my apartment before I let him in.
I'd like to break you in half!
If you did, you'd have two very short friends.
